mapper.select: SELECT manager_id managerId, manager_name managerName, manager_phone managerPhone, manager_email managerEmail, manager_gender managerGender, manager_birth managerBirth, manager_address_main managerAddressMain, manager_address_sub managerAddressSub FROM manager_queue ORDER BY manager_id DESC

SELECT manager_id managerId, manager_name managerName, manager_phone managerPhone, manager_email managerEmail, manager_gender managerGender, manager_birth managerBirth, manager_address_main managerAddressMain, manager_address_sub managerAddressSub FROM manager_queue WHERE manager_id=#{managerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager( manager_id, manager_name, manager_phone, manager_email, manager_gender, manager_birth, manager_address_main, manager_address_sub, manager_accessdate, manager_updatedate ) VALUES( #{managerId}, #{managerName}, #{managerPhone}, #{managerEmail}, #{managerGender}, #{managerBirth}, #{managerAddressMain}, #{managerAddressSub}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET account_state='활성화', account_updatedate=NOW() WHERE account_id= #{managerId}
UPDATE account SET account_state='거절', account_updatedate=NOW() WHERE account_id= #{managerId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.account_id accountId, c.connect_updatedate connectUpdatedate FROM connect c LEFT JOIN account a ON c.account_id=a.account_id WHERE ABS(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,NOW(),connect_updatedate)) >= 6 AND a.account_state='휴면상태'
